com.att.research.xacml.std.pip.engines.jdbc

Class ConfigurableJDBCResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.std.pip.engines.jdbc.ConfigurableJDBCResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurableResolver, JDBCResolver

    public class ConfigurableJDBCResolver
extends java.lang.Object
implements JDBCResolver
    Implements the JDBCResolver for SQL queries with parameters in their prepared statements specified as XACML Attribute values.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    Christopher A. Rath

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfigurableJDBCResolver

        public ConfigurableJDBCResolver()
        Creates a new ConfigurableJDBCResolver that can provide XACML Attributes for the given Collection of com.att.research.xacml.api.pip.PIPRequestss. The mapping from database table field names to XACML Attributes is provided by the fieldsIn Map. The SQL query String is provided by sqlQueryIn. The query string may contain prepared statement parameter place-holders ('?'). The XACML Attributes whose values are used for those place-holders are provided by the given parametersIn List.
        Parameters:
        supportedRequestsIn - the Collection of PIPRequests that are supported by the new ConfiurableJDBCResolver
        fieldsIn - the Map from String field names to PIPRequests in the database table
        sqlQueryIn - the String SQL query that retrieves records that satisfy PIPRequests
        parametersIn - the List of PIPRequests representing parameter values found in sqlQueryIn.

        public void configure(java.lang.String id,
             java.util.Properties properties,
             java.lang.String defaultIssuer)
               throws PIPException
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurableResolver
        Configures this JDBCResolver using the given Properties>
        Specified by:
        configure in interface ConfigurableResolver
        Parameters:
        id - the String identifier for locating properties for this JDBCResolver
        properties - the Properties to search for properties
        defaultIssuer - the default issuer value if none is defined specifically.
        Throws:
        PIPException - if there is an error configuring this JDBCResolver

      • getPreparedStatement

        public java.sql.PreparedStatement getPreparedStatement(PIPEngine pipEngine,
                                              PIPRequest pipRequest,
                                              PIPFinder pipFinder,
                                              java.sql.Connection connection)
                                                throws PIPException
        Description copied from interface: JDBCResolver
        Creates a PreparedStatement for a SQL SELECT statement that will retrieve the data used to generate the XACML AttributeValues.
        Specified by:
        getPreparedStatement in interface JDBCResolver
        Parameters:
        pipEngine - the PIPEngine making the request for XACML AttributeValues
        pipRequest - the PIPRequest with the requested XACML Attributes
        pipFinder - the PIPFinder for finding any other XACML AttributeValues required to build the query.
        connection - the Connection needed to create the PreparedStatement
        Returns:
        a PreparedStatement to query the database for the required XACML AttributeValues.
        Throws:
        PIPException - if there is an error creating the PreparedStatement

      • decodeResult

        public java.util.List<Attribute> decodeResult(java.sql.ResultSet resultSet)
                                       throws PIPException
        Description copied from interface: JDBCResolver
        Creates a List of Attributes from the given ResultSet returned by a SQL SELECT statement. The ResultSet should already be positioned at the first element to decode. The implementation may choose to decode multiple results before returning or may only decode the current result. The implementation should leave the cursor on the last result decoded.
        Specified by:
        decodeResult in interface JDBCResolver
        Parameters:
        resultSet - the ResultSet returned from a SQL SELECT statement.
        Returns:
        a new List of Attributes generated by parsing the given ResultSet or an empty List if there are no results.
        Throws:
        PIPException
